artist: Author: Jean-Antoine Lebrun-Tossa; Publisher: François Buisson
creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund, 1966
description: Fashion periodical in blue paper covers (P.15,531) bound with folded music sheet (P.15,532) with score on the recto and verso; includes an unbound hand-colored engraving with a man and a woman in fashionable dress of the period (P.15,529-P.15,530)
medium: Hand-colored engraving; engraved musical score; letterpress
portfolio: From Journal de la Mode et du Goût, ou amusemens du salon et de la toilette, Paris, 1790–92
title: Journal de la Mode et du Goût, Vingt-unième Cahier, 15 Septembre 1790
